title: Growing impact and scale with ChatGPT
optimized_headline: Unlocking Growth: How ChatGPT Transforms Business Impact and Scale
raw_excerpt: Discover how HiBob uses ChatGPT Enterprise and custom GPTs to scale AI adoption, boost revenue, streamline HR workflows, and deliver AI-powered features in the Bob platform.
raw_body: Discover how HiBob uses ChatGPT Enterprise and custom GPTs to scale AI adoption, boost revenue, streamline HR workflows, and deliver AI-powered features in the Bob platform.
speedrun: HiBob is leveraging ChatGPT Enterprise and custom GPTs to enhance its platform, focusing on improving HR workflows and driving revenue growth. By integrating AI, they aim to streamline processes and offer new features that make HR tasks easier. This approach reflects a broader trend of companies adopting AI to enhance operational efficiency. The move is significant as it showcases how AI can transform traditional business functions.
why_it_matters: HR teams will benefit from streamlined workflows, allowing them to focus more on strategic tasks rather than administrative ones.
The broader market is shifting towards AI integration, indicating that businesses could increasingly rely on technology to improve efficiency and service delivery.

lenses.eli12: HiBob is using advanced AI tools to make HR work easier and faster. Think of it like having a smart assistant that helps you organize your tasks. This is important because it allows everyday workers to spend less time on paperwork and more time on what really matters.
lenses.pm: For product managers and founders, HiBob's use of ChatGPT highlights a growing user need for efficiency in HR processes. By incorporating AI, they could reduce costs associated with manual tasks and improve service delivery. This suggests that investing in AI features could be a practical way to enhance product offerings.
lenses.engineer: HiBob is implementing ChatGPT Enterprise to optimize HR workflows, potentially increasing efficiency through automation. Custom GPTs are being tailored to meet specific HR needs, which could enhance user experience. However, the article does not mention specific performance metrics or benchmarks to assess the impact.
